about_the_game:
Continue your adventure under the sign of fortune with this thrilling special offer that will put some pep in your in-game experience with delightful, unique additions! Give the Drhell's Bells Pack a chance and adopt this adorable Drheller who'll love you and offer you a few gems that it unearthed somewhere.

Show your unique style with:
  • a Drheller pet that will stay faithfully by your side as you sail the seas
  • 300 Gems* to use in the in-game Shop to get cosmetic items

* Gems are an in-game currency used to unlock cosmetic items in WAVEN. Use them to unlock skins for your heroes and companions, as well as to unlock visual effects and emotes to customize your adventure in the World of Twelve.
